snippet: The Bloomberg administration and District Council 37 bitterly dispute the circumstances leading to the impending termination of 700 low-paid workers.
lead_paragraph: The Bloomberg administration and District Council 37 bitterly dispute the circumstances leading to the impending termination of 700 low-paid workers.

headline.main: As School Layoffs Loom, City Points Finger at Union Chief, Who Points Right Back
headline.print_headline: As School Layoffs Loom, City Points Finger at Union Chief, Who Points Right Back
headline.seo: School Aides’ Union and City Hall Clash Over Layoffs
